solution_line_template: He catches {fish_per_day} fish every day for {num_days} days so he catches {fish_per_day}*{num_days} = <<{fish_per_day}*{num_days}={total_fish}>>{total_fish} fish
Each fish yields {fillets_per_fish} fillets so he has {fillets_per_fish}*{total_fish} = <<{fillets_per_fish}*{total_fish}={total_fillets}>>{total_fillets} fish fillets
